meanings.definition: A man who engages in numerous casual sexual relationships with women.
meanings.sent1: The womaniser at the party was surrounded by many women.
meanings.sent2: He gained a reputation as a womaniser due to his many flings.
meanings.sent3: The womaniser joked that he needed a map to keep track of all his dates.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a womaniser spread like wildfire through the small town.
meanings.sent5: The womaniser's lifestyle was the talk of the town.

meanings.definition: A person who habitually pursues or has casual sexual relationships with women.
meanings.sent1: She was warned about the womaniser who frequented the bar.
meanings.sent2: The womaniser's smooth talk always seemed to work with the ladies.
meanings.sent3: The womaniser's calendar was filled with dates every night of the week.
meanings.sent4: Her friends referred to him as the ultimate womaniser of the group.
meanings.sent5: The womaniser's charm was undeniable to those around him.
